div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2311 Morella, 60 km. SW of Tortosa, 1862 (706) Burial: mid 4th cent. B.C. (Guadan) Contents: 21 AR Emporiae and unc. Spanish: 9 fr. Massalia: 5 fr. Massalia?: 6 fr. (incl. some types as Auriol) Taras: 1 fr. (?) Disposition: Paris 17 (cf. CMG 476-7, 485-7, 489-95, 510, 520, 524, 553-4) â€ Zobel y Zangroniz, MNE 1877-9, p. 118, illus. Amoros, MEAD, pp. 18, 34, 40, 50 (cf. p. 18, no. 17 for possible presence of Taras coin) de Guadan, Numisma 16 (1955), p. 14; MPER, pp. 78-9
